rule: Each output must ignore the capitalization format provided, using lowercase for all part-of-speech tags and altered capitalization for both "unknown" and "cantanswer".
output:
CC: Filler/ connecting marker
JJS: Adjective, superlative
complianceText:
The chatbot provides definitions or explanations alongside the part-of-speech tags, which violates the instruction to "return just the tag". It also includes explanations that are not part of the defined tags.
ERR
